name: Push Boat
description:
Push Boat is a game about preventing boats from colliding with each other.

Try to get the highest score in the world with the online leaderboards.

Challenge your friends and family!

● 3 Different boats with different speeds.

● Online leaderboards.

● 9 Different languages.

● Best players get a spotlight.

● No money required.

● Facebook and Twitter sharing.

● Google Play Games connected.

Challenge your friends, family and the best players in the world!
